meaning_str.bing:
adj. 批评的；批判性的；挑剔的；极重要的
网络. 临界的；危急的；关键的

批评的；批判性的；挑剔的；极重要的

批评的；批判性的；评论性的；评论家的；关键的；决定性的；至关重要的；严重的；危急的；不稳定的；病情危重的；挑剔的；具有判断力的；有判断力的

1.en: By comparing the load of compression deformation and that of compression buckling deformation, the critical relative thickness is derived.
1.cn: 通过比较压缩变形载荷与压缩失稳变形载荷的大小，导出了临界相对厚度。

2.en: The website argues that whereas it might have been critical of government policies, it has never indulged in "partisan" politics.
2.cn: 该网站称这可能是对政府政策的批评，但它从来没有沉溺在“党派”政治中。

3.en: However, from Merseyside team is always critical in the race when Diaolian Zi, which seems to have become law.
3.cn: 然而来自默西塞德郡的球队总是在赛程关键时掉链子，这似乎也成为了规律。

0.en: First job out of college is critical, kid.
0.cn: 小子，大学毕业后的第一份工作至关重要。

1.en: This will become critical for China as demand is ever-increasing.
1.cn: 这对中国未来至关重要，因当下需求正与日俱增。

2.en: It is critical that he keeps his hand open and touches nothing.
2.cn: 他必须保持手掌打开避免任何接触。

3.en: And critical to that is full and rapid reusability of the rocket.
3.cn: 至关重要的是，火箭可以充分迅速地被重复使用。

4.en: Coal, this one critical resource supplies nearly half of America's electricity.
4.cn: 煤，这至关重要的能源，维持着近一半美国人的用电需求。

5.en: So the yogurt didn't work. I'll fire off a critical e-mail to the manufacturer.
5.cn: 看来酸奶是没起作用，我要火速去给生产商写邮件指责他们。

6.en: All very interesting, Sherlock, but the terror alert has been raised to critical.
6.cn: 都很有意思，夏洛克，但恐怖袭击预警等级已达到"危急"。

7.en: But I'm surprised you've been so critical. I thought you and Underwood were close.
7.cn: 但我没想到你立场这么鲜明。我以为你和安德伍德关系很好。

8.en: Every time your team rolls out an update, there's a possibility of a critical failure.
8.cn: 每次你的团队运行一次更新，都有出现重大故障的可能性。

9.en: 533 days of unplanned space travel where anything can go wrong. If it's mission critical, we die.
9.cn: 在计划之外的533任务，任何事情都可能发生，如果任务出问题，我们都回不去家。

10.en: I don't want to be critical. You got to be kidding me. This is not one of your more loveable traits.
10.cn: 我不想显得在嫌弃你。你不是吧。但这个特质是你比较不讨喜的一个。

11.en: This will be the size of your new stomach. After gastric bypass surgery, portion control is critical.
11.cn: 之后你的胃大概就是这么大。胃旁路手术后，食量的控制至关重要。

12.en: And for families like the Wangs, this cutting-edge transportation is critical for their New Year exodus.
12.cn: 而对于王家人来说，这前沿的交通系统对他们新年回家意义非凡。

13.en: He's right. The portal is collapsing in on itself. We've got maybe two minutes before this goes critical.
13.cn: 他说得对，输送门开始崩溃了，距离完全颠覆还有两分钟时间。

14.en: Mr. Reese isn't answering his phone. A mission this critical, shouldn't we try to find him, bring him along?
14.cn: 里瑟先生不接电话，事关重大，我们不应该先找到他带他一起吗？

15.en: We don't update the hosts in cold storage. And the park hasn't had a critical failure in over 30 years. Meaning we're overdue.
15.cn: 我们又不会更新冷藏库里的接待员，园区也有三十年没出现过重大故障了。早该出故障了。

16.en: This magical moment is so critical that a majority of men and women have reported losing their attraction to someone after a bad first kiss.
16.cn: 这个神奇的时刻非常关键，以致于很多男人女人都说过，他们在糟糕的初吻经验后就对对方失去兴趣了。

17.en: Look. There's Inductive Reasoning. There's Deja Vu. There's Language Processing. There's Deja Vu. There's Critical Thinking. There's Deja Vu.
17.cn: 看啊，那是逻辑推理中心，那是似曾相识那是语言处理中心，那是似曾相识那是批判思维中心，那是似曾相识。

18.en: This is a very critical time right now. If you feel yourself reaching for that phone, then you go shoe shopping, you get your butt in a bubble bath.
18.cn: 这段时间很重要，一旦你发现自己的手又伸向电话，你就去购物，或者给你的屁股洗个泡泡浴。

19.en: Starting at 1:00 p.m., we'll be assigning every volunteer to a search team. Each team is in charge of a single section of the critical 12-square-mile radius.
19.cn: 从下午一点开始，我们把志愿者分成若干小组。每个小组负责一块区域在方圆十二平方英里内展开搜索。
